name: SuicidalMinions
description:
Every 10 seconds a suicidal minion gets to sad, it actually dies. Help them!

It’s inspired by the good old Lemings <3

You only need a mouse to set the interaction mode and then click on the minion you want to manipulate.

Created within 72 hours.

Tools: Blender, Mixamo (animations), Unity, C#, FLstudio

  • 3D Models: Sebastian
  • Everything else : Caro
